posts.post_content:
T206 Raw Fred Payne - MOVED TO A NEW POST

If you want to purchase this card:

1. The first person to post "Ill take it" will get the card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the email text.
3. Make payment by PayPal
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please leave up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
